2327.verse: أَفَرَءَيْتَ|Then, have you seen|160|186|11287$ٱلَّذِى|he who|68|121|138$كَفَرَ|disbelieved|92|145|950$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|in Our Verses,|113|166|408$وَقَالَ|and said,|80|106|1089$لَأُوتَيَنَّ|"Surely, I will be given|167|250|11288$مَالاً|wealth|64|230|8446$وَوَلَدًا|and children?"|112|195|10788$

2328.verse: أَطَّلَعَ|Has he looked|112|125|11289$ٱلْغَيْبَ|(into) the unseen,|141|167|5611$أَمِ|or|38|64|9003$ٱتَّخَذَ|has he taken|106|132|11290$عِندَ|from|56|82|521$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|the Most Gracious|140|153|3$عَهْدًا|a promise?|90|90|767$

2329.verse: كَلَّا‌ۚ|Nay,|50|64|11291$سَنَكْتُبُ|We will record|113|142|3555$مَا|what|53|82|262$يَقُولُ|he says,|76|105|77$وَنَمُدُّ|and We will extend|145|174|11292$لَهُۥ|for him|65|94|977$مِنَ|from|50|64|156$ٱلْعَذَابِ|the punishment|122|349|482$مَدًّا|extensively.|99|326|11279$

2330.verse: وَنَرِثُهُۥ|And We will inherit (from) him|215|227|11293$مَا|what|53|78|262$يَقُولُ|he says,|76|100|77$وَيَأْتِينَا|and he will come to Us|170|194|11294$فَرْدًا|alone.|63|75|11295$

2331.verse: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ|And they have taken|159|176|10857$مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|besides Allah,|143|178|2971$ءَالِهَةً|gods,|72|107|5479$لِّيَكُونُواْ|that they may be|136|171|11296$لَهُمْ|for them|76|93|98$عِزًّا|an honor.|83|83|11297$

2332.verse: كَلَّا‌ۚ|Nay,|50|70|11291$سَيَكْفُرُونَ|they will deny|113|152|11298$بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ|their worship (of them)|173|212|11299$وَيَكُونُونَ|and they will be|125|164|11300$عَلَيْهِمْ|against them|106|126|22$ضِدًّا|opponents.|94|94|11301$

2333.verse: أَلَمْ|Do not|64|71|348$تَرَ|you see,|77|91|2301$أَنَّآ|that We|74|88|4147$أَرْسَلْنَا|[We] have sent|124|138|1342$ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ|the devils|110|124|953$عَلَى|upon|63|77|52$ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|the disbelievers,|128|135|364$تَؤُزُّهُمْ|inciting them|105|320|11302$أَزًّا|(with) incitement.|139|354|11303$

2335.verse: يَوْمَ|(The) Day|87|115|1057$نَحْشُرُ|We will gather|114|170|11307$ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ|the righteous|108|164|1567$إِلَى|to|53|109|118$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|the Most Gracious|140|168|3$وَفْدًا|(as) a delegation|133|133|11308$

2337.verse: لَّا|Not|43|54|30$يَمْلِكُونَ|they will have the power|184|206|9394$ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ|(of) the intercession|156|178|11311$إِلَّا|except|65|87|86$مَنِ|(he) who|80|102|1673$ٱتَّخَذَ|has taken|85|96|11290$عِندَ|from|56|151|521$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|the Most Gracious|140|330|3$عَهْدًا|a covenant.|100|195|767$

2338.verse: وَقَالُواْ|And they say,|113|157|760$ٱتَّخَذَ|"Has taken|91|179|11290$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ|the Most Gracious|140|228|1415$وَلَدًا|a son."|66|110|1079$

2340.verse: تَكَادُ|Almost|64|77|11313$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتُ|the heavens|115|141|3277$يَتَفَطَّرْنَ|get torn|96|122|11314$مِنْهُ|therefrom,|89|115|571$وَتَنشَقُّ|and splits asunder|140|166|11315$ٱلْأَرْضُ|the earth|92|105|589$وَتَخِرُّ|and collapse|102|187|11316$ٱلْجِبَالُ|the mountain|107|277|9461$هَدًّا|(in) devastation|126|211|11317$

2341.verse: أَن|That|51|102|655$دَعَوْاْ|they invoke|97|199|11318$لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|to the Most Gracious|159|261|11157$وَلَدًا|a son.|61|112|1079$

2342.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|82|46$يَنۢبَغِى|is appropriate|110|131|11319$لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|for the Most Gracious|163|184|11157$أَن|that|48|69|655$يَتَّخِذَ|He should take|118|139|2968$وَلَدًا|a son.|61|71|1079$

2344.verse: لَّقَدْ|Verily,|61|92|3466$أَحْصَـٰهُمْ|He has enumerated them|186|248|11321$وَعَدَّهُمْ|and counted them,|146|208|11322$عَدًّا|a counting.|95|126|11306$

2345.verse: وَكُلُّهُمْ|And all of them|120|130|11323$ءَاتِيهِ|(will) come (to) Him|151|170|11324$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|124|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection|159|178|820$فَرْدًا|alone.|63|73|11295$

2327.verse: Then, have you seen he who disbelieved in Our verses and said, "I will surely be given wealth and children [in the next life]?"

2328.verse: Has he looked into the unseen, or has he taken from the Most Merciful a promise?

2329.verse: No! We will record what he says and extend for him from the punishment extensively.

2330.verse: And We will inherit him [in] what he mentions, and he will come to Us alone.

2331.verse: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.

2332.verse: No! Those "gods" will deny their worship of them and will be against them opponents [on the Day of Judgement].

2333.verse: Do you not see that We have sent the devils upon the disbelievers, inciting them to [evil] with [constant] incitement?

2334.verse: So be not impatient over them. We only count out to them a [limited] number.

2335.verse: On the Day We will gather the righteous to the Most Merciful as a delegation

2336.verse: And will drive the criminals to Hell in thirst

2337.verse: None will have [power of] intercession except he who had taken from the Most Merciful a covenant.

2338.verse: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken [for Himself] a son."

2339.verse: You have done an atrocious thing.

2340.verse: The heavens almost rupture therefrom and the earth splits open and the mountains collapse in devastation

2341.verse: That they attribute to the Most Merciful a son.

2342.verse: And it is not appropriate for the Most Merciful that He should take a son.

2343.verse: There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.

2344.verse: He has enumerated them and counted them a [full] counting.

2345.verse: And all of them are coming to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone.
